pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==============================ZenginCode==============================|circle| |version|The python implementation of ZenginCode.ZenginCode is datasets of bank codes and branch codes for japanese.Installation==============.. code-block:: bash pip install zengin_codeUsage==============.. code-block:: python from zengin_code import Bank Bank.all # => OrderedDict([(u'0001', <zengin_code.bank.Bank object at 0x1044173d0>), ...Contributing===============Bug reports and pull requests are welcome on GitHub at https://github.com/zengin-code/zengin-pyLicense===============The package is available as open source under the terms of the `MIT License <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>`_ ... |circle| image:: https://img.shields.io/circleci/project/zengin-code/zengin-py.svg :target: https://circleci.com/gh/zengin-code/zengin-py.. |version| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/zengin_code.svg :target: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/zengin_code/ :alt: latest version
